preface.title: What's LIXA?
preface.para: LIXA is acronym of LIbre XA: it's a free, libre, open source implementation of two X/Open specifications: "Distributed Transaction Processing: The TX (Transaction Demarcation) Specification" TXspec and "Distributed Transaction Processing: The XA Specification" XAspec.

The main goals of LIXA project are:
implementing an XA compliant Transaction Manager
supplying a TX compliant Application Programming Interface (API)
to be free

From the following links you can buy and/or download official X/Open documentation:
RefModel
Distributed Transaction Processing: Reference Model, Version 3
TXspec
Distributed Transaction Processing: The TX (Transaction Demarcation) Specification
XAspec
Distributed Transaction Processing: The XA Specification
LIXA documentation tries to avoid duplication with the content of the above books.
